DOC.brief_title: Attention Training Learning Enhancement Resilience Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Following consent , participant engage assessment process determine eligibility . Once eligibility confirm , participant schedule another assessment session determine current level cognitive function . This process consist paper-pencil survey computerized test . Following assessment process , participant engage Internet browser-delivered training session conduct internet-accessible computer . The computerized training session do 7 time week ( day ) participant 's convenience ( recommended time commitment 5 time week ) . Following completion training , participant 's cognitive function re-assessed . Participation voluntary participant may withdraw study time .
DOC.criteria: Participants must 65 year age old Participants must diagnosis agerelated cognitive decline confirm interview performance screen assessment Participants must fluent English speaker Participants must adequate visual , auditory , motor capacity use computerize intervention Participants diagnosis PTSD , depression psychologically diagnosable emotional disorder Participants history condition could affect think ability , include brain injury , mental illness , cancer , neurological condition ( multiple sclerosis , seizure disorder ) , HIV/AIDS exclude Participants enrol another concurrent research study exclude Participants difficulty perform assessment comprehend follow spoken instruction , judgment screen clinician , exclude Participants current significant past history substance abuse exclude Participants show sign suicidal ideation behavior exclude referred appropriate treatment
